title: Change render_group's "fit" kwarg default from False to True
body:

- [ ] I've added tests for new code.
- [x] I accept that @willmcgugan may be pedantic in the code review.

## Description

I may be missing something, but I believe it would make sense for `@render_group()` to have the same `fit` kwarg default as it's `RenderGroup` counter-part (i.e. `True`, as opposed to `False`)â€”this PR simply changes just that.

My experience: I used `RenderGroup` before `@render_group()`, and had gotten used to `fit` defaulting to `True` (without knowing about the measurement mechanism at the time), so I was initially confused as to what was creating huge measurements when I was rendering a nested renderable-like object.
